Author: N'esswen Latteh
Name: N'esswen's Chat Tools
Description: N'esswen's chat tools for additional message filtering. Use /nct to set up.
Punchline: N'esswen's chat tools for additional message filtering.

Author: N'esswen Latteh
Name: N'esswen's Macro Repeater
Description: Adds a /nmr command that will repeat current macro from the beginning.

Author: N'esswen Latteh
Name: N'esswen's Padlock Mover
Description: Allows you to (slightly) move the actionbar padlock. Use /npm to configure.

Author: N'esswen Latteh
Name: N'esswen's Pulse Duplicator
Description: Duplicates the pulse animation for currently used ability across all actionbars.

Author: N'esswen Latteh
Name: N'esswen's Retainer Notes
Description: Adds a new column for retainers for a note. Use /nrn to set up the notes.
